description: This file defines a React functional component NavBar that renders the application's top navigation bar with links such as Home, Browse, Search, Favorites, and user authentication related links like Profile, Login, Register, and Logout. It uses React Router for navigation and context for authentication state.

methods.name: NavBar()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the top navigation bar with brand and key links, handling user authentication state to display profile and logout options.
